20aa697f-b4ad-489a-a05a-0182b6060ebe.description: Rackspace Technology is dedicated to elevating internal expertise and supporting Racker development, which is why Rackspace University launched 52+ Learning Initiative. Every Racker is empowered to spend at least 52-hours a year dedicated to learning. Rackers that accomplishes 52+ hours of dedicated learning will earn their Learner badge. Learning hours can be spent; in the classroom, observing, working new projects that require new skills/knowledge, mentoring, reading, on-demand learning, etc.
20aa697f-b4ad-489a-a05a-0182b6060ebe.name: Learner

badge_template_activities.title: Rackers that achieve and log 52+ hours into Workday

f2bb29d8-5ef8-4bc9-9048-3dfe5f284cc7.description: A Multicloud Practitioner is someone who understands the basic concepts of hyperscaler offerings and private cloud concepts. It is expected that a racker who fits this category has a basic knowledge of cloud platforms, basic understanding of IT platforms, a competency in knowledge of core cloud use cases, and a demonstrated competency of Rackspace's key hyperscaler and private cloud offerings.
f2bb29d8-5ef8-4bc9-9048-3dfe5f284cc7.name: Rackspace MultiCloud Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: 1 certification from at least 2 of the following domains: Azure domain - 900 level courses; AWS domain - Cloud Practitioner; Google domain - Digital Cloud Leader; K8s domain; OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain; VMware domain - VMware Sales Professional or Operations Professional; Attestation from the Racker's Manager that the Racker is familiar with Rackspace's current cloud based offerings and can articulate their value proposition to prospective and current customers.

Azure domain: AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals DP-900 Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals AI-900 Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals MS-900 Microsoft 365 Certified: Fundamentals PL-900 Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Fundamentals SC-900 Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals
AWS domain: Cloud Practitioner
Google Cloud domain: Digital Cloud Leader
K8s domain
OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain
VMware domain: VMware Sales Professional (HCI, SV, NS, NSX, vRA, VROps, CH, or CP) VMware Operations Professional

ea7b3db5-ba47-4a99-8ba9-d9bf2b6018b7.description: Rackspace Technology is dedicated to elevating internal expertise and supporting Racker development. Every Racker is empowered to spend at least 52-hours a year dedicated to learning. Rackers that are fanatical about learning will earn a top tier level Learning Badge if they accomplish 152+ hours of learning during the year. Learning hours can be spent; in the classroom, observing, working new projects that require new skills/knowledge, mentoring, reading, on-demand learning, etc.
ea7b3db5-ba47-4a99-8ba9-d9bf2b6018b7.name: Fanatical Learner

badge_template_activities.title: Rackers that achieve and log 152+ hours into Workday
Learner

659d4d02-7776-484d-82fe-7ae04e58c566.description: A Racker who has subject matter expertise at implementing, managing, and monitoring hyperscaler and private cloud environments. Examples include having a working knowledge of cloud platforms, familiarity w/ multi factor application design, a deep understanding of storage types/use cases, when to apply specific instance types, when to recommend cloud native solutions, cloud governance concepts, cost optimization, IAM policy and controls, well architected concepts, DevOps functionality, and more.
659d4d02-7776-484d-82fe-7ae04e58c566.name: Rackspace Multicloud Leader

badge_template_activities.title: 1 certification from at least 3 of the following domains: Azure domain -Associate level; AWS domain - Associate & Specialty level; Google domain - Associate Cloud Engineer; K8s domain; OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain - RHCSA/Terraform; VMware domain - VCTA; Demonstrate the ability to their direct manager they can create a customer facing contract for Rackspace's Hyperscaler cloud resell service offerings and at least one other cloud offering that would solve for customer's business needs.

Microsoft Certified - Azure: Azure for SAP Workloads Specialty, Azure Developer Associate, Azure Enterprise Data Analyst Associate, Azure AI Engineer Associate, Azure Network Engineer Associate, Azure Security Engineer Associate, Azure Database Administrator Associate, Azure Data Engineer Associate, Azure Data Scientist Associate, Azure IoT Developer

Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365: Finance and Operations Apps Developer Associate, Dynamics 365 Field Service Functional Consultant Associate, Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate, Power Platform Developer Associate, Power Automate RPA Developer Associate, Power BI Data Analyst Associate, Security Operations Analyst Associate, Identity and Access Administrator Associate

AWS domain (Any 1): Solutions Architect - Associate, Developer - Associate, SysOps Administrator - Associate, Advanced Networking - Specialty, Database - Specialty, Security - Specialty, SAP - Specialty
Google Cloud domain (Any 1): Associate Cloud Engineer
K8s domain
OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain (Any 1): RHCSA or Hashicorp Terraform - Certified Associate
VMware domain (Any 1): VCTA-DCV, VCTA-NV, VCTA-CMA, VCTA-Security

ab92f612-1908-4609-8548-5aa226c52f71.description: A Rackspace Presenter is a credible leader that has demonstrated the needed skillset and knowledge around a particular topic. This technology leader has a vested interest in building and maintaining Rackspace technology, infrastructure and services. This presenter has the ability to think through current and future technology transformation through a talk session or an interactive workshop. Examples include presenting at the Rax.io annual summit, a Tech Talk, or other Rackspace specific events.
ab92f612-1908-4609-8548-5aa226c52f71.name: Rackspace Presenter

badge_template_activities.title: Present at rax.io conference, Tech Talk, or other Rackspace specific events.

af13f0d5-119d-42d2-a1d8-0922e28a7248.description: The Rackspace Technology Council (RTC) is a cross-functional, inclusive, and diverse governance body that plans, manages, and operationalizes initiatives within the Office of the CTO to make them sustainable for the long run. The team is representative of technical and focus areas across Rackspace and provides thought leadership and expertise to continue the evolution of our Technology Foundation.
af13f0d5-119d-42d2-a1d8-0922e28a7248.name: Rackspace Technology Council 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Nominated by the CTO.

c023f3fd-2569-4ad4-81c9-c3aa12bb56c0.description: The TCT Program is an elite program designed to identify, develop and fully utilize the very best technical resources in Rackspace on our top challenges, providing value to the business and meaningful challenges to our employees. A TCT Principal Racker is both a person who is technically excellent and who has leveraged his or her knowledge to improve outcomes for a substantial number of people.
c023f3fd-2569-4ad4-81c9-c3aa12bb56c0.name: TCT Principal

badge_template_activities.title: Creation: TCT members should be creating new things and finding solutions to complex problems rather than solely optimizing (but optimizing in addition to creating is certainly welcomed)
Business Impact: The projects they’ve worked on should have a wide and large impact on the business.
Impactful Work: Should make contributions to the business that positively affects teams outside of their specific BU
Known Leader: Should be a known technical leader and a "go-to" person for technical knowledge in one or more areas.
Technical Reach: Should be very strong in a few technical areas and use the knowledge to build something novel with other teams
Rackspace Reach: Should be able to be dropped into any other technical team in Rackspace and lead a project successfully.

3a367488-6157-4ccd-ab6d-e41370574790.description: This Racker is one of the elite, recognized by their peers with the Technical Innovation award for leveraging technology to solve a complex challenge for Rackspace or our customer base. The creativeness and drive exhibited by this Racker is highlighted as a representation of the great work Rackers are capable of.
3a367488-6157-4ccd-ab6d-e41370574790.name: Technical Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: Awarded the Technical Innovation award that is delivered during monthly CTO Tech Talk.

da3fa5e2-e6ab-47d1-a78b-6ad65f2fcc3f.description: An Advanced Presenter is a conference presenter that has engaged in internal and external opportunities to cover and discuss a given topic in front of an audience of viewers. This presenter has communicated their findings and ideas in an innovative and impactful manner to drive change. Examples include presenting at a Hyperscaler or Private Cloud conference, or any Industry wide event representing Rackspace and/or their community.
da3fa5e2-e6ab-47d1-a78b-6ad65f2fcc3f.name: Advanced Presenter

badge_template_activities.title: Present at Hyperscaler or VMWare Conference

5d21bfb3-e4f5-4562-b044-4bb1a5dd8bcb.description: A Published Racker is one that has proactively engaged with our internal and external facing platforms to write an article to influence a greater audience inside/outside of Rackspace with their expertise around a relevant topic, area and or field. They exemplify the strategic ability to persuade and impact the thoughts of community followers within their industry.
5d21bfb3-e4f5-4562-b044-4bb1a5dd8bcb.name: Published Racker

badge_template_activities.title: Rackspace published White Paper or Article

c4fa53a4-e2b3-4595-9e17-ec92fd356846.description: A AWS Expert is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on AWS platform and looking to further expand deeper into the platform. The Racker is considered an AWS subject matter and a Go-To person for all things AWS.
c4fa53a4-e2b3-4595-9e17-ec92fd356846.name: Expert - AWS

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 4 certifications covering AWS Professional and Specialty track. (Foundational & Associate certifications not considered)
Explore all AWS Certification exams.

c260cbe0-27b4-42d9-835f-447119937a88.description: A Multicloud Architect is categorized is an individual who builds upon the subject matter foundation of a Multicloud Leader role into an advanced and more technical cloud skillset as a deep subject matter expert. A Multicloud Architect will demonstrate advanced skills in network and cloud design, implementation, management of cloud infrastructure, well architecture frameworks, application design, DevOps best practices, Security, and Cloud Governance.
c260cbe0-27b4-42d9-835f-447119937a88.name: Rackspace Multicloud Architect

badge_template_activities.title: 1 Professional certification from at least 3 of the following domains: Microsoft domain - Azure Architect level; AWS domain - Professional & Specialty level; Google domain - Professional level; K8s domain - CKA; OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain - OpenStack COA/RHCE/RHCS-CSA; VMware domain - VCP Professional level; 1 Certification from at least 2 of the domains in the Cloud Leader criteria that are not from the same domain as the professional level domain

Microsoft domain (Any 1): Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions, Microsoft Certified Cybersecurity Architect Expert, Azure Virtual Desktop specialty, Azure for SAP specialty, Azure security specialist, Design & Implement analytic solutions using PowerBI(DP 500)
AWS domain (Any 1): Solutions Architect - Professional, Developer - Professional, Data Analytics - Specialty, Machine Learning - Specialty

Google Cloud domain (Any 1): Professional Cloud Architect, Professional Cloud Database Engineer, Professional Cloud Developer, Professional Data Engineer, Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer, Professional Cloud Security Engineer, Professional Cloud Network Engineer, Professional Machine Learning Engineer, Professional Collaboration engineer
K8s domain (Any 1): CKA or CKAD or CKS
OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain (Any 1): OpenStack COA, RHCE, RHCS-CSA, Hashicorp certified associate - Terraform + (Vault or Consul)
VMware domain (Any 1): VCP-DCV Professional, VCP-NV Professional, VCP-CMA Professional, VCP-Security Professional

0593ce79-9084-4a0d-84cc-288c2f25541a.description: A GCP Expert is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on GCP and looking to further expand deeper into the platform. The Racker is considered an GCP subject matter and a Go-To person for all things GCP.
0593ce79-9084-4a0d-84cc-288c2f25541a.name: Expert - Google Cloud

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 4 certifications covering the GCP Professional track. (Foundational & Associate certifications not considered)
Demonstrate your expertise and validate your ability to transform businesses with Google Cloud technology.

81dc5e37-e845-4b5f-869d-0d627b001343.description: An Expert of Kubernetes & Containers is deemed as an individual that has obtained mastery on Container & Kubernetes technology or is on the path to developing mastery. The Racker is considered a container specialist and a Go-To person for all container & kubernetes related topics.
81dc5e37-e845-4b5f-869d-0d627b001343.name: Expert - Kubernetes & Containers

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 2 certifications from the following: CKD, CKAD, CKS & Red Hat Certified Specialist in Containers and Kubernetes.
Red Hat Certified Specialist in Containers and Kubernetes courses.
Container and Kubernetes training catalog

69574fa7-1bd0-47e9-a363-b6cbc845f30d.description: A Multicloud Architect - Triple Threat is categorized is an individual who has obtained mastery of a specific cloud domain while still building up their skill sets within other cloud domains.
69574fa7-1bd0-47e9-a363-b6cbc845f30d.name: Rackspace Multicloud Architect - Triple Threat

badge_template_activities.title: Expert level certification from at least 3 of the following domains: Microsoft domain - Azure Architect Expert level; AWS domain - 2 or more Professional & Specialty level certs; Google domain - Certified Fellow or 2 or more Professional level certs; K8s domain - CKA + CKAD; OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain - OpenStack COA or RHCE-OS+ RHCE; VMware domain - any 1 VCAP level cert; 1 Cert from at least 2 of the domains in the Cloud Leader criteria not from the same domain as professional level

Microsoft Domain - Microsoft Certified (Any 1): Azure Solutions Architect, Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Apps Solution Architect Expert, DevOps Engineer Expert, Dynamics 365 + Power Platform Solution Architect Expert, Power Platform Solution Architect Expert, Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert

AWS domain: (2) or more AWS Cloud domain certifications listed in the AWS Multicloud Architect criteria: Solutions Architect - Professional, Developer - Professional, Data Analytics - Specialty, Machine Learning - Specialty

Google Cloud domain: Google Certified Fellow; or (2) or more Google Cloud domain certifications listed in the Google Multicloud Architect criteria: Professional Cloud Architect, Professional Cloud Database Engineer, Professional Cloud Developer, Professional Data Engineer, Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer, Professional Cloud Security Engineer, Professional Cloud Network Engineer, Professional Machine Learning Engineer
K8s domain ( Any 2) : CKA, CKAD, CKS
OpenStack and Cloud Operations domain (Any 1): OpenStack COA, RHCSA-OS + RHCE, Hashicorp certified associate (Terraform + Vault + Consul)
VMware domain (Any 1): VCAP-DCV, VCAP-NV, VCAP-CMA

63c3c849-a0c3-4e1d-89a1-7128616fc259.description: A TCT Senior Principal is a Racker who is technically excellent and who has leveraged his or her knowledge to improve outcomes for a substantial number of people. These Rackers are extraordinarily productive, personally driving the mission of Rackspace forward and excel at identifying and leading cross-functional solutions teams. They are recognized for living our Racker values and are valued for their insight, experience, and knowledge.
63c3c849-a0c3-4e1d-89a1-7128616fc259.name: TCT - Senior Principal

badge_template_activities.title: TCT Principal
Accelerate - Effectively provide structure and help to high-priority programs and projects. Provide a cross-BU coterie that encourages cooperation and makes projects more successful.
Provide - Provide a “technical bench” to respond efficiently to the ongoing technical needs of the business. Be visible “specialists” that help us respond to new pressures and sales opportunities.
Create - Elevate new ideas and opportunities to the SLT for consideration. Provide technical feedback to senior leadership. Promote learning and growth within the Rackspace technical community

Engage - Increase the job satisfaction of our top technical Rackers by engaging them in Rackspace’s mission. Provide them the opportunities and compensation that will keep them at Rackspace and attract like talent.

182a693f-fee6-4867-af92-af4a07b23651.description: A Azure Expert is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on Azure platform and looking to further expand deeper into the platform. The Racker is considered an Azure subject matter and a Go-To person for all things Azure.
182a693f-fee6-4867-af92-af4a07b23651.name: Expert - Azure

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 4 certifications covering Azure Specialty & Expert track. (Foundational & Associate certifications not considered)
Browse Certifications and Exams. Learn new skills to boost your productivity and enable your organization to accomplish more with Microsoft Certifications.

5b4b9cb6-e084-4a3e-a470-7a415f0d699a.description: A Expert for Data Engineering is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on Database and Data Analytics technologies spanning beyond a single hyperscaler or technology vendor. The Racker is considered a Data specialist and a Go-To person for all Data Engineering and Analytics related topics.
5b4b9cb6-e084-4a3e-a470-7a415f0d699a.name: Expert - Data Engineering

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 1 certification each from 2 or more hyperscalers. AWS: Database Specialty, Data Analytics Specialty; Azure: Data Engineering on Azure (DP-203), Azure Cosmos DB Developer Specialty (DP-420), Customer Data Platform Specialty (MB-260), Designing Database Solutions for Microsoft SQL Server (70-465), Azure Enterprise Data Analyst Associate (DP-500), Power BI Data Analyst Associate (PL-300); GCP: Professional Data Engineer, Professional Cloud Database Engineer.

Minimum 1 certification each from Snowflake and Databricks. Snowflake: SnowPro Core, SnowPro - Advanced - Architect, SnowPro - Advanced - Administrator, SnowPro - Advanced - Data Engineer, SnowPro - Advanced - Data Analyst; Databricks: Data Analyst Associate, Data Engineer Associate, Data Engineer Professional.

6644efd4-397c-4341-a1c6-bac1b970808e.description: A TCT Distinguished Racker has taken their skills and proven the ability to lead and inspire others in a technical context. Distinguished Rackers use their skills to create leverage for Rackspace far exceeding their personal reach. Rackspace trusts Distinguished Rackers to be on the front lines, communicating and engaging with those outside Rackspace. Distinguished Rackers are also able to repeatedly lead/manage chartered projects to completion, providing the promised benefits.
6644efd4-397c-4341-a1c6-bac1b970808e.name: TCT - Distinguished

badge_template_activities.title: Accelerate - Effectively provide structure and help to high-priority programs and projects. Provide a cross-BU coterie that encourages cooperation and makes projects more successful.
Provide - Provide a “technical bench” to respond efficiently to the ongoing technical needs of the business. Be visible “specialists” that help us respond to new pressures and sales opportunities.
Create - Elevate new ideas and opportunities to the SLT for consideration. Provide technical feedback to senior leadership. Promote learning and growth within the Rackspace technical community

Engage - Increase the job satisfaction of our top technical Rackers by engaging them in Rackspace’s mission. Provide them the opportunities and compensation that will keep them at Rackspace and attract like talent.

ca9e0af8-1a8f-4b2a-b63d-96ee0a1d95da.description: A Expert for Data Science is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning technologies and Data Science practice spanning beyond a single hyperscaler or technology vendor. The Racker is considered an AI & ML specialist and a Go-To person for all AI & ML related topics.
ca9e0af8-1a8f-4b2a-b63d-96ee0a1d95da.name: Expert - Data Science

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 1 certification each from 2 or more hyperscalers. AWS: Machine Learning Specialty; Azure: Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100), Azure AI Engineer Associate (AI-102), Power BI Data Analyst Associate (PL-300), Azure Enterprise Data Analyst Associate (DP-500); GCP: Professional Machine Learning Engineer.

Minimum 1 certification each from Snowflake and Databricks. Snowflake: SnowPro - Advanced - Data Scientist, SnowPro - Advanced - Data Analyst. Databricks: Machine Learning Associate, Machine Learning Professional, Data Analyst Associate.

ed9e023a-bfa1-4263-ae93-520b36eca2a2.description: A VMware Expert is deemed as an individual who has obtained mastery on VMWare or on the path to developing mastery. The Racker is considered a VMware specialist and a Go-To person for the specified specialization track within VMware.
ed9e023a-bfa1-4263-ae93-520b36eca2a2.name: Expert - VMware

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum 3 certifications above VCP level (which includes VCAP and VCDX). Could include certs across all the VMware tracks such as DCV, Security, EU Computing, Cloud Mgmt & Automation, NV & App Modernization.
VMware Certification Tracks. Find the optimal path to achieve proficiency and accreditation.

f1baf4e2-e0e3-434f-b841-e06484940725.description: Rackspace Technology is dedicated to elevating internal expertise and supporting Racker development. Every Racker is empowered to spend at least 52-hours a year dedicated to learning. Rackers that are fanatical about learning will earn a top tier level Learning Champion badge if they accomplish 152+ hours of learning during the year plus lead a learning session created for their peers. In conjunction with RU, this session will be uploaded into Workday to be available for all Rackers.
f1baf4e2-e0e3-434f-b841-e06484940725.name: Learning Champion

badge_template_activities.title: Rackers that achieve and log 152+ hours, as well as create/instruct a training session that is uploaded into Workday.

c9ea25ff-d4ad-4885-a784-2aefd540e73a.description: A Fellow is a Racker who has achieved luminary status outside of Rackspace due to their ideas, creations, and communications shared with the world at large. Fellows influence technologists far outside their immediate scope. Their presence at Rackspace reflects huge value onto our brand in the eyes of other technologists, attracting other technically excellent people to Rackspace.
c9ea25ff-d4ad-4885-a784-2aefd540e73a.name: TCT Fellow

badge_template_activities.title: Accelerate - Effectively provide structure and help to high-priority programs and projects. Provide a cross-BU coterie that encourages cooperation and makes projects more successful.
Provide - Provide a “technical bench” to respond efficiently to the ongoing technical needs of the business. Be visible “specialists” that help us respond to new pressures and sales opportunities.
Create - Elevate new ideas and opportunities to the SLT for consideration. Provide technical feedback to senior leadership. Promote learning and growth within the Rackspace technical community

Engage - Increase the job satisfaction of our top technical Rackers by engaging them in Rackspace’s mission. Provide them the opportunities and compensation that will keep them at Rackspace and attract like talent.
